analysis_age: "young professionals, driven, positive and a lot of fun to be around" is language that is intended to appeal to younger candidates.
analysis_general: "Competitive salary" - this has been shown to decrease diversity in the candidate pool.
text: :  . ,  . :   4-6    . I was never a sit-down type of person, always wanted to move around and interact with people. I found that working with children is greatly rewarding: not only youre up on your feet, playing and chatting all day but you get energized and inspired after every lesson with them and you can influence their lives for the better. This lifestyle has led me to finding a group of like-minded individuals and creating a strong team of young professionals, driven, positive and a lot of fun to be around, while working towards the same goal: to provide the best experience to children in learning English. We, Lux. English, are a language school and on a hunt for a professional of the same mindset. You will be that teacher, you always wanted to have in school: positive, cool, smart and passionate about the subject. All you need is excellent English, charisma, analytical mindset and a will to learn and grow. We will help you with the visa process and our teachers can give you ins and outs of the first few months living in Russia. Our team is very diverse. We have teachers from all over the globe. Lets jump into specifics: We Offer: A professional, multi-cultural environment. Competitive salary. Supporting materials to help you prepare for lessons and improve as a teacher. Beautifully designed classrooms. Job Details: Your working hours are from 3 p. m. to 7:30 p. m. and/or 10:00 a. m.  2 p. m. on Saturdays. School is open Monday through Saturday you pick 5 out of 6 days. We guarantee you to have a full schedule. There is a maximum of 8 students in each class. Students are grouped by age and level. If any of the above speaks to you then, please, send us your resume. We look forward to hearing from you! Lux. English Family. Teamleading   ,   , 1.
metadata:
{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614aabdbcf366611016b7dc4::headhunter_ru", "source": "headhunter_ru", "country": "RU", "company": "Люкс Инглиш", "position": "Native English Teacher for Kids", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

Возможна подработка: сменами по 4-6 часов или по вечерам

I was never a sit-down type of person, always wanted to move around and interact with people. I found that working with children is greatly rewarding: not only you’re up on your feet, playing and chatting all day but you get energized and inspired after every lesson with them and you can influence their lives for the better. This lifestyle has led me to finding a group of like-minded individuals and creating a strong team of young professionals, driven, positive and a lot of fun to be around, while working towards the same goal: to provide the best experience to children in learning English.

We, LuxEnglish, are a language school and on a hunt for a professional of the same mindset. You will be that teacher, you always wanted to have in school: positive, cool, smart and passionate about the subject. All you need is excellent English, charisma, analytical mindset and a will to learn and grow.

We will help you with the visa process and our teachers can give you ins and outs of the first few months living in Russia. Our team is very diverse. We have teachers from all over the globe.

Let’s jump into specifics:

We Offer:

  • A professional, multi-cultural environment
  • Competitive salary
  • Supporting materials to help you prepare for lessons and improve as a teacher
  • Beautifully designed classrooms

Job Details:

  • Your working hours are from 3 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. and/or 10:00 a.m. – 2 p.m. on Saturdays
  • School is open Monday through Saturday you pick 5 out of 6 days
  • We guarantee you to have a full schedule
  • There is a maximum of 8 students in each class
  • Students are grouped by age and level

If any of the above speaks to you then, please, send us your resume.

We look forward to hearing from you!

LuxEnglish Family

Ключевые навыки

Teamleading
Английский язык

Адрес

Москва, микрорайон Северное Чертаново, 1а
Показать на большой карте
"}
